channel.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 66, "I'm Done Doing"
channel.description:
http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-66-im-done-doing/
We discuss conferences, sleazy game industry, Andrey goes deep on his passion for coding, saying no to work, going to the psychologist, meditation, meetups, vacations, Disney love.
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring! [Sign up today](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016) and get $20 off.
